attr.q: Give an example of each of the following, or argue that such a request is impossible.
A Cauchy sequence with an unbounded subsequence.
A Cauchy sequence with an unbounded subsequence
attr.a: Impossible. Cauchy sequence is convergent sequence, and convergent sequence can't have unbounded subsequence.

attr.q: A divergent monotone sequence with a Cauchy subsequence.
attr.a: Impossible. Divergent monotone's subsequences are always divergent monotone subsequence.
